item.title: Windows PE Export Directory Table (windbg)

item.title: Windows PE File structure (windbg)
item.description: Step by step how to inspect the PE structure files using windbg debugger.

item.title: Ldr field in PEB
item.description: The Ldr is one of the most important field in PEB, Ldr is a pointer to a PEB_LDR_DATA structure that contains information about the loaded modules for the process.

item.description: We can load external plugins to help during reverse engineering/exploit development.

item.title: How to generate smallest shellcode ? (msfvenom)
item.description: During exploit development sometimes we have a smaller buffer or part of buffer mangle the shellcode even when removing the bad characters.

item.title: Narly plugin for windbg
item.description: Narly is a plugin that parses the image and identifies the binary protections mechanisms enabled such as DEP, ASLR, SafeSEH and GS.
